titleStmt.title: Prynn against Prinn. Or, the answer of William Prynne, utter Barrester of Lincolnes Inne: to a pamphlet lately published by William Prynne Esquire, a member of the House of Commons. Intituled A Briefe Memento to the present un-parliamentary Juncto, touching their present intentions and proceedings to depose and execute Charles Steuart, their lawfull King. January 25. 1648. Imprimatur Theodore Jennings.
titleStmt.author: Purefoy, William, 1580?-1659.

titleStmt.title: Prynn against Prinn. Or, the answer of William Prynne, utter Barrester of Lincolnes Inne: to a pamphlet lately published by William Prynne Esquire, a member of the House of Commons. Intituled A Briefe Memento to the present un-parliamentary Juncto, touching their present intentions and proceedings to depose and execute Charles Steuart, their lawfull King. January 25. 1648. Imprimatur Theodore Jennings.
titleStmt.author: Purefoy, William, 1580?-1659.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Prynne, William A briefe memento to the present un-parliamentary junto.
Attributed to William Purefoy by DNB and ESTC. Cf. LCNA.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 26. 1648"; the "9" in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
